posts.post_title: 1907 SOLD Wolverine News Schmidt & Coughlin PC
posts.post_content: Selling   Sold 1907 Wolverine   Charlie Boss Schmidt $125---Bill Coughlin $150--check scans--shipping is $6.00--I will mail in Priority box so holders don't break---thanks,  Don
